altername_name: Harry Potter 3: Shen Qi Zhi Guang Lun
name: Harry Potter 3 & the Mystical Halo
overview: Harry Potter 3 is a shoot 'em up game for the Game Boy Color released in 2002. Despite the name, its plot is loosely based on that of Harry Potter & the Philosopher's Stone, with graphics in the introductory cutscene taken from the official Game Boy Advance game of the same name.
